title: Interpretation of seeing my dead mother baking in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my deceased mother baked in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com. Married women, pregnant women, men, young men, and divorced women. What is the interpretation of seeing my deceased mother baking bread in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman baking her dead mother’s bread is one of the good visions that indicate the opening of wide doors of livelihood for the dreamer. Seeing a married woman offering bread to a dead man in a dream states that it brings goodness and blessings. For the pioneer. Dreaming of offering bread to a man, showing loyalty and intense concern for the people of her household. Seeing a married woman offering bread to young children in a dream is one of the desired visions shown by many good children. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant dead woman in a dream. What is the interpretation of a divorced woman if she sees her dead mother baking bread in a dream? Seeing a divorced woman in a dream preparing bread for her mother is a sign of a happy life. What is the interpretation of seeing a man preparing bread in a dream? Seeing a man preparing bread in a dream indicates enjoying health, well-being, and recovery. From illness. Seeing a man eating white bread in a dream indicates a happy life. Seeing a man distributing bread to others in a dream expresses his high morals and his love for goodness. It is one of the desired visions. See also: The interpretation of seeing my dead grandmother in a dream. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees bread in In a dream? A young man sees bread in a dream. It indicates a good wife that people love. Seeing a young man preparing bread in a dream indicates the arrival of many livelihoods and an improvement in his financial condition. What is the interpretation of seeing bread in a dream? Seeing yourself giving bread in a dream, for the needy and the poor, indicates The wisdom of the dreamer and the strength of his knowledge. Seeing him in a dream that he is distributing bread to undeserving people indicates the many blessings in the dreamer’s life and God’s satisfaction with him. I see myself taking bread from another person in a dream. These are desirable visions that indicate that he has received a large inheritance from one of his relatives. See also Interpretation of seeing my mother in a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing bread in a dream? Seeing in a dream buying bread and not being able to pay for it suggests a feeling of security and joy in his life. Seeing a merchant selling bread in a dream claims that he has achieved huge profits and gains through his trading. What is the interpretation of seeing my dead mother in a dream? And she bakes for Ibn Sirin? Seeing a dead mother baking bread in a dream and distributing it to others shows his good condition, the seriousness of his religiosity, and his closeness to God Almighty. Seeing a dead mother’s bread alive white in a dream indicates family stability and a feeling of psychological comfort. Seeing a dead mother preparing bread in a dream announces good deeds and status. The greatness of God Almighty. See also: Interpretation of seeing a corpse in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing rose bread in a dream? Seeing rose bread in a dream is an indication of distress and extreme sadness due to high prices and miserable living. Seeing a single girl returning bread in a dream is...

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing white hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing white hair in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing gray hair in a dream through interpretation books for single, married, pregnant or divorced women, the effects of seeing white hair or gray hair in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq, through Ibn Sirin, through Ibn Kathir, or Al-Nabulsi or Ibn. Shaheen Street. In fact, white or gray hair appears more often with age, and in some cases gray hair appears in some people at an early age, perhaps due to genetic inheritance or weakness in the scalp or hair itself. As for the interpretation of seeing gray hair or white hair in a dream, it has very important repercussions, according to the author of the vision himself, and we will continue to interpret this vision in detail for all scholars through our article. Seeing white hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing white hair in a dream is that he hates it and interprets it. Although it is sad and sad, especially if the insight is small. Interpretation of seeing white hair by Ibn Sirin. If the white hair on the head is few, this indicates some fears and sorrow that will end soon. But if the whole head is covered with white hair, this indicates bad luck or very bad news, perhaps there was the death of a relative White hair in a dream for a married woman. White hair all over the body in a married woman’s dreams indicates great debts, even if part of the hair is distinct or the front of a married woman’s hair, and this indicates that her husband is not in good health and that it is visible. To others. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman’s gray hair, and if she is pregnant, the vision indicates that she has given birth to a male child. Interpretation of a dream about white hair for a pregnant woman. For a pregnant woman who sees in her dream that her hair is white, this means that she will give birth to a male child, and she will have a clear and distinguished future that will be intelligent and successful. And he will be honored with him everywhere. ; This indicates the gender of the new baby and that he will be born a male, God willing. White hair in general is harmful to young men and adolescents. As for the great and ancient, it is goodness, dignity and respect, and white hair in general is a vision that does not deserve praise and does not bode well, and God knows best. White hair in a man’s dream. Seeing a man in his dream that his white hair fills his head and the man appeared in his dream not wearing completely naked clothes, this dream indicates Until something great will happen to the dreamer and he will suffer a great tragedy. Seeing a man in a dream wearing clean and beautiful clothes, his head full of white hair, and his vision indicates that he feels remorse for something. The man sees in a dream an old man with white hair, and the vision indicates that the dreamer will face Financial difficulties, crises and problems in his married life. For a man to see a beautiful woman with white hair in his dream, the dream promises the opinion that there is a lot of good on the way to him and that his affairs will improve materially, socially and practically. And if one sees himself in a dream getting old and his hair changing from black to White, as its vision shows that the dreamer is a person who dedicates the right path and maintains it

And if a person sees himself in a dream aging and his hair changes from black to white, then his vision shows that the dreamer is a person who devotes himself to the right path and maintains

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a market in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: The market in a dream has many meanings and meanings for dreamers, and this makes them desperate to know it and understand what it refers to. In the following article, we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this topic. Let us read the following. The market in a dream. The dreamer’s vision of the market in a dream indicates the many benefits that he will enjoy in his life. In the coming days, which will make him in his best state ever. If someone sees the market in his dream, this is a sign that he is putting great effort into his work and will enjoy seeing the fruits of his labors in front of him soon. If the dreamer watches the market during his sleep and illness, this indicates that he has found The appropriate medicine for his illness and his health condition will gradually begin to improve after that. Seeing the dreamer in a dream about the market means that he will achieve many things that he has dreamed of achieving for a long time, and this will make him very happy. The market in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of the market in a dream as evidence of his ability to defeat Enemies who surrounded him from all sides and wanted to get rid of him. If one sees a market full of goods in his dream, this is a sign that his business will be very prosperous in the coming days and he will collect a lot of profits from it. If the dreamer sees the market while he is asleep, this expresses the good events that It will happen in his life and he will be very satisfied with it. For the dreamer to see in his dream a purchase and no one knows about it, symbolizes losing a lot of money as a result of problems in his work and not dealing with the situation properly. The market in a dream Fahd Al-OsaimiFahd Al-Osaimi interprets the dreamer’s vision of the market in a dream on It is a sign of the many blessings that he will receive in his life in the coming days, which will make him well off. If one sees a crowded market in his dream, this is a sign of the happy occasions that he will attend and the atmosphere around him will be filled with joy and happiness. In the event that the dreamer sees an empty market during his sleep This indicates that he will not succeed in achieving his goals due to the many obstacles that he will face and prevent him from doing so. Seeing the dreamer in a dream about the market symbolizes the good news that he will receive, which will make him very happy. What does buying in a dream mean for single people? Seeing an unmarried woman In a dream in a perfume market means that she will receive an offer of a wife from a young man with good morals, and she will like him and agree with him immediately. If the dreamer dreams of shopping for clothes, this is a sign of the abundance of food that he will enjoy in his life and that will make him very comfortable. In the event that the dreamer sees An empty market in her dream, this means that she does not think wisely at all before taking any new step in her life, and this makes her vulnerable to many problems. Seeing a market in a dream when the girl does not know anyone, symbolizes a major deterioration in her psychological state in the coming period due to many fears. That she will suffer. What is the interpretation of buying in a dream for a married woman? A married woman’s vision of the market in a dream indicates that her husband will obtain a very important position in his workplace and an increase in salary, which will contribute to improving

Seeing drinking guava juice can also indicate freedom from trouble, and God Almighty is high. When you see an unmarried girl drinking guava juice It may represent marriage to a person who respects her, and God knows best, everything he has not seen. Seeing the dreamer drinking guava juice can lead to happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about drinking thyme juice in a dream. title: Interpretation of rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of rain in a dream: Rain is a beautiful thing and many people are attracted to its appearance. It is one of the well-known symbols of romance. In heavenly religions, it is a sign of sustenance and goodness. The world of dreams also agrees with this interpretation that Rain contains blessings and benefits, and there is other evidence that we find in the article below... Follow usInterpretation of Rain in a DreamSeeing rain in a dream, according to the opinion of many scholars, has several indications, but it is generally considered a good dream and brings many It is good news for the dreamer in his life. It is good to see rain in your dream, because it is a sign that there is a lot of benefit and goodness on its way to you. In addition, seeing rain outside your house symbolizes that you will meet someone you love and miss very much. Rain in a dream is Good news of comfort and relief from distress and sadness. If the dreamer sees heavy rain in a dream, this means that he is excelling in his field of work and will soon receive a promotion. Walking in the rain in a dream symbolizes that the absent will return by order of God. Interpretation of rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the Imam believes Ibn Sirin said that seeing rain in a dream is strong evidence that the dreamer’s life will change for the better and that the coming days will bring good news for him. If the dreamer sees in a dream that rain is falling on him in the summer, this means that the dreamer will achieve great success in his life. When one sees in his dream that The rain is falling and he is suffering from some crises in reality, which means that he will get out of these problems and his circumstances will be for the better. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream rain falling inside her, this indicates that God is honoring her and granting her many material benefits. Interpretation of rain in a dream for Nabulsi. Imam Nabulsi will see that rain In a dream, it carries many good meanings, especially if it does not harm the dreamer. If the dreamer sees in a dream rain falling on him, it is interpreted that there will be mercy from God and facilitation of his affairs. Also, seeing heavy rain in a dream indicates that the person feels fear and anxiety about some events. What is happening around him. Rain falling on plants in a dream means that dreams will come true and desires will come true. What is the interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for a single woman? Many wonder about the interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for an unmarried woman, and the scholars’ interpretation appeared as a good omen that will soon be her lot. If a girl sees in a dream that it is raining, this means that she will get married soon by God’s command. When the dreamer sees that there is rain watering the ground in a dream and is confused with something in reality, this indicates that God will be with her and lead her on the right path. Also, The interpretation of rain in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that there will be stability in her professional life and she will earn a lot of profits during this period. Getting rid of worries and achieving safety and psychological comfort is the interpretation of a girl’s vision of very clean rainwater falling. What is the interpretation of walking in the rain in a dream? For a single woman? If an unmarried woman dreams that she is walking in the rain

Many people wonder about the interpretation of seeing rain in a dream for an unmarried woman, and the interpretation of scholars appeared as a good omen that will soon be her fate. If a girl sees in a dream that it is raining, this means that she will soon marry by the command of God. When the dreamer sees that there is rain watering the land in a dream and is confused with something in reality, this indicates Until God will be with her and guide her on the right path. Also, the interpretation of rain in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates that there will be stability in her professional life and she will reap a lot of profits during this period. Getting rid of worries and reaching safety and psychological comfort is the interpretation of the girl’s vision of very clean rainwater falling. title: Interpretation of dyeing hair in a dream - the meaning of dreaming of dyeing hair in a dream

preview.html: Seeing hair dye for an unmarried, married, pregnant, or divorced girl, whether it is black, yellow, red, white, or blonde, or in the salon, or at the barber, and more than that according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing hair dye in a dream: Yourself dyeing hair in a dream is one of those dreams that have many meanings, as the interpretation varies depending on the dreamer’s condition and also varies according to the color of the dye used. If one dreams of seeing hair dye in a dream, where the dreamer was dyeing his hair, then this dream carries with it good news that The dreamer will hear good news soon. If a young man dreams that his hair is dyed, then this dream is a harbinger of the upcoming marriage date or it may indicate the beginning of a new life full of joy. If someone dreams of seeing himself dyeing his hair in a dream, where he saw that he dyed his hair blonde, This dream is good news for the pious person that God’s comfort is near, but if the dreamer is far from God, then this dream explains that the dreamer will face some problems that will disrupt his life and cause him sadness, or that he will be envied by those who hate him and want to harm him, and the second interpretation is obtained. If the dreamer feels the last period before the dream a. A strong headache. If someone dreams of dyeing his hair black, then this dream has two meanings: problems and conflicts with someone close to him or his family, or some problems and fears will affect him. If someone dreams of dyeing his hair brown, then this dream is good news for the dreamer. If one dreams To dye his hair red, if the dreamer is in a romantic relationship, then this dream means that this emotional relationship is very strong and there is intense mutual love between the two parties. If someone dreams that his hair is red and he is not satisfied with the color, then this dream means that the dreamer feels strong feelings Of hatred, hatred and anger towards someone and wants to take revenge on him and seriously harm him. If a person sees that his hair has turned yellow and he hates its appearance in the dream, this means that the dreamer is going through a state of sadness and some problems, but if the dreamer admires the color of his yellow hair, this means that he will The dreamer lives a peaceful life and enjoys happiness and love. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing hair dye in a dream can be a sign of the loss or death of someone close to the dreamer. It means, through God, that he will face many obstacles and problems. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing hair dye in a dream It means that the dreamer will live a long time and earn a lot of money. For some interpreters, seeing hair dye in a dream means that the dreamer will go through a series of happy circumstances and that his life will change for the better. If an unmarried girl sees herself dyeing her hair in a dream, this dream means that The dreamer will soon hear happy news, and this news is related to marriage and engagement. If a woman dreams that her dyed hair has grown in length, this means that the dreamer is a beautiful woman and will grow in beauty, grace and splendor. Interpretation of a dream about dyeing hair by Ibn SirinWhoever sees that he is dyeing his hair, this is good news for a good occasion.

title: Interpretation of a dream about girls in a dream

preview.html: We learn about the interpretation of the vision for single and married women, men, pregnant women, young people and divorced women through gptafser.com/, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing little girls in a dream about a single girl If an unmarried girl sees little girls in her dreams. It is one of her promising visions to change the situation, its justice and make it better. Seeing her in her dream as unmarried means that she is carrying a child. A vision indicates the achievement of all her dreams and goals in life. Seeing a single girl in her dream about a little girl crying in a dream. A vision indicates that God will get her out of her distress and pain. Either in the case of a little girl crying a lot in a single dream. The vision indicates the presence of problems and obstacles in her life. The little girl in a single girl's dream was ugly. What her vision indicates is that the owner of the vision will face some problems and difficulties in her next life. The appearance of a thin girl in the dream of an unmarried girl, and she was wearing torn and dirty clothes. The vision indicates that the owner of the vision finds obstacles in her next life that are difficult to face. Little girls in a single girl's dream. And it appears That the owner of the vision will soon marry a good young man whose financial situation is easy. Chasing the single girl in her dream with young girls and hiding from them. It is interpreted as an indication that the owner of the vision is trying hard to find comfort and joy. But every time her efforts fail. See also: Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq Interpretation of seeing young girls in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in her dream a group of girls, they smile at her in a dream, and the visionary does not have children. Her vision is auspicious for her that God Almighty will soon grant her good offspring and pregnancy will occur. Seeing a married woman in her dream that she is carrying a baby girl in her arms. An indication of hearing news that pleases the visionary, and that God will soon relieve her, God willing. A married woman was carrying a baby girl in her hand and then fell to the ground. An indication that the owner of the vision will lose many desires that were about to come true. Seeing a dead girl in a dream for a married woman. It is interpreted as a married woman saying goodbye to a dream she wanted to achieve in her life. Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is carrying more From a little girl in a dream. Good news for her about the possibility of food, blessing and goodness for her husband and home. If a married woman sees a little girl crying in a dream. It is one of the visions that do not bode well for a wise woman because it indicates anxiety, sadness and regret that the woman will see in her upcoming life. A married woman sees a dead girl in her sleep and discovers that she was killed. It is one of the satanic visions, and the dreamer must seek refuge in God from the accursed Satan and not allow anyone to see it. Interpretation of seeing little girls in a dream about a man and its meaning If a man sees a little girl in a dream. His vision suggests that the woman will get a new job or a promotion at work. And the girl carried by the man in his dream. It indicates the effort made by the viewer to maintain his work. As for the girl crying in a dream about a man. It indicates the

title: Interpretation of a race in a dream: A dream about a running race in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about a car race in a dream, an unmarried married woman, a pregnant woman, winning a horse race, running with someone. Interpretation of matches in a dream. If you dream that you are in a race in a dream, this represents your competitive spirit and how you tend to measure yourself against others. Otherwise, this dream may mean that you need to slow down and take a different path in life. To dream that you are winning a race represents your full potential and ability to achieve your goals. I hope you feel strong and able to overcome your obstacles and overcome those who stand in your way. The dream gives you confidence and can be an experience of your success. If you dream that you are losing a match, it means that you are exaggerating your abilities and perhaps setting your sights on goals that are too far and unattainable. It indicates the competitive spirit of the dreamer, which often appears in his social and professional life. A vision of racing may indicate In a dream, it indicates that the dreamer needs to step back for some time so that he can see things more clearly before fighting a certain battle or making a decision. If you dream that you are winning a match, this is a sign of your great abilities that you will seek to recruit so that you can achieve your future ambitions and goals. You may Winning a race in a dream means that the dreamer will be able to achieve his goals that he has always aspired to in the coming period. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is losing the race, this indicates an overestimation of his efforts and that his abilities do not allow him to achieve what he aims for, contrary to what he He imagines it. Losing a race in a dream indicates difficult goals and ambitions that the dreamer wants that are difficult to achieve. A person who participates in a race in a dream means that he will search for an opportunity in his life in which others will compete with him, and the result of the race in the dream reflects the result of his search. Of the people, this is an indication of his victory and his ability to reach this job. The above applies to horse races and foot races, as they are all competitions, they are all horse races, and they are all seeking to achieve a goal. Whoever wins a horse race or a horse race, this means that he defeated his competitors and reached what he is. . Striving. If a person sees in his dream that he is competing with others, then this, as we mentioned above, indicates the presence of someone competing with him for a goal that he seeks and life is based on competition, because everyone is competing. Money, property and so on. If a person sees in a dream that his competitors are defeating him, this indicates his defeat in competition in reality. Interpretation of a race track in a dream. As for a race track: If you see a race track in your dream, it means that you will have happiness and wealth in your hands, but your good friends They will criticize your low moral behavior. Interpretation of the match - YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing the word congratulations in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a congratulatory word in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Married women, pregnant women, men and women. What is the interpretation of seeing the word congratulations in a dream: Seeing the word congratulations in a dream is a sign to bring goodness, abundance and blessings to the dreamer and the sick person in good health and a speedy recovery. Seeing congratulations in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will achieve great gains and gains and God’s blessings for the dreamer in his life and work. See also: Interpretation of seeing the words of Muhammad, the Messenger of God, in Paradise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the word congratulations in a dream for a single girl: A single girl seeing the word “Congratulations” in a dream is an example of her great success in her studies and life. A single woman seeing a word of congratulations in a dream is an indication of her great happiness in her relationship with a good young man. And the creation and success of her romantic relationship. Seeing a girl hearing congratulations in a dream indicates that she has obtained great academic degrees from different universities and her ability to solve her problems and overcome her crises. Seeing a single girl saying the word “Congratulations” in a dream indicates involvement in an important and important job in the company. See also: Interpretation Seeing the word Qais in a dreamWhat is the interpretation of a married woman who sees a word of congratulation in a dream: A married woman seeing a word of congratulation in a dream announces her success in her family life and the stability of her relationship with her husband. A married woman seeing a lambrequin in a dream indicates the excellence of her children in their studies and upbringing. Seeing a woman hearing a word of congratulation in a dream This dream indicates her happy pregnancy soon and her keen interest in her husband and children. A married woman seeing a word of congratulation in a dream says that it brings goodness and a lot of livelihood to her husband. A married woman seeing success and a word of congratulation in a dream is a sign of her husband’s love for her, his high morals, and his efforts to please her. See also: Interpretation of seeing words God in the sky in a dream. What is the interpretation of a man who sees the word congratulations in a dream: A man who sees the word congratulations in a dream is a sign of God’s success in his marital and professional life and his idea of ​​traveling abroad to secure his family’s future. A man who sees the word congratulations in a dream is a sign of assuming high positions and being promoted at work. Vision A man hearing congratulations in a dream is a sign of his striving to stabilize his marital relationship and make his wife and children happy. Seeing an unemployed person in exchange for the word “Congratulations” in a dream is an indication of starting big projects and achieving great success in them. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees the word “Congratulations” in a dream: Seeing a pregnant woman With a congratulatory word in a dream is a sign that it brings true joy and happiness to the dreamer. Seeing a pregnant woman saying congratulations in a dream is an indication of the approaching vulva, the death of the pregnancy, and the exhaustion of childbirth. Seeing a pregnant woman hearing a congratulatory word in a dream is an indication of God’s facilitation in matters of her birth and granting her a just and righteous son. See also: Interpretation Seeing words written in the sky in a dream What is the interpretation of a young man who sees a word of congratulations in a dream: Seeing a young man hearing a word of congratulations in a dream indicates his bright future and great success in his work and life. A young man who sees in his dream the word “Congratulations” indicates his imminent marriage to his beloved.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dog - Ibn Sirin: Seeing a dog barking in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dogs for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman. If a black and white dog is chasing me, seeing dogs chasing me, white dogs attacking me and running away, running after me, and more. Interpretation of a dog in a dream. The most important thing that distinguishes seeing a dog in a dream is that you are suffering from a problem with your faith in your life. Dogs are lovable and loyal creatures to their owners and can be very good owners*. So if you dream of a dog, then you need a loyal friend in your life.And if you dream of a dog in the workplace, it means that you will find a loyal and sincere person in your workplace. Also, dogs in dreams cause terror, especially if you dream that you are on a dark road and there is a dog on the road, this means that you are very worried about something in your life. And when you dream that a dog is barking a lot, this indicates that there are things in your life that require more attention. Focus. A dog in a dream refers to a foolish (and foolish) person out of ignorance and madness. Interpretation of dogs in a dream. A dog in some dreams may represent a person in your life who reflects the above-mentioned qualities and may in turn indicate a talent or skill that you have ignored or forgotten. And if the dog in the dream is violent or barks loudly High, this reflects an internal conflict that you are experiencing, it is the embodiment of some kind of betrayal and the fact that someone in your environment is not qualified to trust, or even trust yourself. . If you see a sick dog in your dreams, this symbolizes a friendship that you have neglected or that you feel neglected by one of your friends. But if the dog in the dream is dead or dying, this vision translates to the loss of a stable friendship and sometimes means that a part of you and your intuition has begun to weaken greatly. If you dream that you are feeding a dog, it means that you are developing and nurturing an old skill or talent again. Also, if you see a dog with puppies in a dream, this reflects your ability to care for others. But if you dream that a dog bites your leg, this reflects your failure to balance the various aspects of your life. Also, biting can mean that you are hesitant to move forward in an area or that you do not want to continue with your previous goals. But if you dream that a dog bites another person, this reflects your feeling of guilt because you have wronged or betrayed someone in your life. On the other hand, buying a dog in a dream reflects your tendency to buy off your friends or flatter them to get some privileges and flattery. In other cases, this type of dream can also mean your need to find a partner to share your daily life with. If you dream that you are hurting or hitting a dog, it means that you doubt the intentions of a friend or that you feel that a dear friend is letting you down because he is not supportive. But If you see in a dream a dog eating a snake, this symbolizes that a close friend is trying to prevent you from making a bad decision. Interpretation of a dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing a dog in a dream that it varies according to the state in which he saw it, so if one sees in a dream that a dog A lion is barking at him, then the meaning of this dream is that there is an enemy in this man’s life, but if someone sees in a dream that there is a dog...
